melody_GT.content: Let it be, let it be, let it be, let it be. Whisper words of wisdom, let it be.

baseline.content: Let it be, let it be, let it be, let it be. Whisper words of wisdom, let it be.

variant_a.content: Let it be, let it be, let it be, let it be. Whisper some wisdom, let it be.

variant_b.content: Let it be, let it be, let it be, oh let it be. Whisper words of wisdom, let it be.

melody_GT.content: Hey Jude, don't make it bad. Take a sad song and make it better.

baseline.content: Hey Jude, don't make it bad. Take a sad song and make it better.

variant_a.content: Hey Jude, don't make it bad. Take a sad tune and make it better.
